text: int main ( void ) { int n , i , t , j , max ; int a [ n ] [ n ] ; scanf ( "%d" , t ) ; while ( t -- ) { max = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) a [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; if ( i >= 1 ) { max = a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; if ( j >= 1 ) { if ( a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] > max ) max = a [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; } } a [ i ] [ j ] += max ; } max = a [ n - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( max < a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ) max = a [ n - 1 ] [ i ] ; } printf ( "\n%d" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
